comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content: 22 April 1944: 2LT Samuel J. Lowman, Jr of the 63rd Fighter Squadron, 56th FG was at the controls of P-47D 42-8426 (coded UN-P) for this accident. He went MIA three months later on a dive bombing mission south of Bernay, France on 6 July (MACR 6700) when his element was attacked by enemy fighters.
